chapter.title: Advantages of the Mobicents Sip Servlets Arquillian Framework
chapter.para: One of the most important advantage of the framework is the clear and concise model the framework provides.

The framework's main two parts, are individual and can be replaced by an equivalent module if needed, the sip client for example can be replaced with a user provided sip client. Also, later there will be containers for the framework based on Tomcat 7.x and JBoss AS 7 that could be used instead of the Tomcat 6.x container.
The fact that the framework is based on Arquillian is also a big advantage of the solution. Users can make use of the Arquillian extensions, or use Arquillian SPI to provide their own extension
